name: Safe Buster (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.7b Details Title Safe Buster Model No. JB-63 Series Game & Watch ( Multi Screen ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date January 12, 1988 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

A security guard must risk life and limb to protect a bank's safe from a dangerous robber looking to blow it open in this multi-screen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch™ series of handheld electronic games.

Gameplay

Use the LEFT and RIGHT buttons to move the guard on the lower screen so he catches the bombs being thrown by the robber from the upper screen.

The guard however can only hold a maximum of 3 bombs at a time so he has to dispose of them periodically on either end of the lower screen.

For additional bonus points, disposing of the bombs on the left side of the screen will set a flaming torch flying into the air. The flaming torch will eventually descend back down but if the guard can throw enough bombs in succession the torch will eventually rise high enough to light up the bomber's arsenal and blow him up earning 20 bonus points.

A miss occurs whenever the guard fails to catch a bomb. Three misses and the game is over.
